fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm env-refresh migrations handle constrained indexes and UTF-8 fixtures
fields.request_details: On a Windows workstation, run `.\env-refresh.bat --latest` using the default PowerShell environment. Verify the command no longer generates a `nodes_node_constellation_device_unique` removal migration, applies all database migrations without constraint errors, and loads the OCPP manual fixture without UnicodeDecodeError. Capture the console output for the release log if any migration failure reappears.
